show.subtitle: Your Economic Survival?  They're Not Looking Out For You.  We are.
show.title: The Wake Up Call

header.title: Extreme Overindebtedness Really Is The Problem

title: Extreme Overindebtedness Really Is The Problem
content:
The process by which the point-of-no-return (the point at which the gravitational pull in physics becomes so great that... <!--more--> nothing can escape) causes the great financial unraveling to take place.
This is called the singularity.
In financial and economic terms we have reached singularity by way of the famed ‘black hole’ which sucks everything into it.
The collapse of the economic bubble creates its own black hole which will not respond to any stimulus measures.
As the Fed goons slowly arrive at this realization and understanding, the horror will become absolutely apparent in Yellen’s demeanor when she talks publicly.
Watch for it.
It will be unmistakable.
More on the media.
(Apologies!
) Interesting statistics which show that even the public is tiring of their lies and hype.
The Fed stress tests.
The financial system is truly shakier than ever.
10% of the European banks have failed their own stress tests.
More on deleveraging and deflation and how they will play themselves out.
The vulnerability of the financial system, a pyramid of debt and credit that could – and will – fall apart at any time.
The story of Amazon which has never made a profit at any time since it was created.
Yet the stock is trading near $300/share!
(Don’t look at me.)
